reviews:
It's really good I recommend getting this app, I'm a YouTuber and edit my videos with this. Make sure you play around for you can get the hang of it   Full Review   
 Import old projects I just upgraded to pro and I'm wondering if there's any way to import old projects/draft that I had on the free version. Is there a way to do this?   Full Review   
  Needs more features but still worth the purchase.. Please add the ability to slow down or speed up sections of a video clip and not just the ability to do the entire clip.. With sections edited for speed will make for s much more professional presentation!   Full Review   
 "HD export, not HD." Well I uploaded a file in 1080p hd and when exported to gallery.. it automatically exported to 380 quality.  Not happy with this.   Full Review   
 This is so... ah.. I have no words thanks for this amazing app. I don't buy an app. ever. except that I know it's worth it. This is def worth it. I would like to request more themes and fx. Thanks   Full Review   
 Torn I want to like it very much. No other app I've tried makes trimming clips as easy. But ... I put up a video made with this and immediately got a copyright ding because of the song. And I paid for HD version and there's no HD export. So I feel like I've been deceived.   Full Review   
 Very Good I'm still trying to figure out things, but mostly its good. It makes cute little videos. I haven't had any problems with anything. I wish it had more music though.   Full Review   
 More features pls I hope you will add more themes,stickers, music (etc )for different occasions .. both free and with charge.. i used birthday theme. And annoying to use it again haha ofcourse my viewers will notice same theme.. with the songs i just downloaded to other sites. thanks  -pls add video rotate tool..  getting problems on video quality and sound.. never happened before   Full Review   
 Help!!! (UNSUPPORTED FILE) It doesn't let mi edit my vids,and it puts unsupported file,before the update this did not hapen!!!!"""""   Full Review   
 GALAXY S4 Doesn't let me do anything when I click something it lags then kicks me to viva.videos home screen   Full Review   
 Pretty good Vid quality isn't great. Really easy to use. Wish it had more music to choose from   Full Review   
  It works perfectly fine until you try and put a filter on. The fairy filter turns out okay until you send it to instashot or save it, then it just has random blocks of pixelated colour.   Full Review   
 Video Quality not good 👎 Before i have a free app then i pay the pro version to fix the video quality but it still same the problem ... it's most to be HD video. . But it's not 👎   Full Review   
 Great app, but crashed to many times, however I still like it Very good app, but I wish it didn't  crash so much. It might be due to low space on my phone.   Full Review   
 Not bad The only problem is that I can't add two different songs nor stop the music at the right spot I wanted it to.   Full Review   
 Good app Thus is a good app with many features. I just have one complaints and that the video quality. They should really let you pick your quality.   Full Review   
 Didn't work for me I wanted to use this app to rotate a video. It worked, but shrank the frame down to about half of full size.   Full Review   
 Bought, hour later says all my files are not supported! ! I loaded free, worked, wanted to get rid of water marks, then pro worked for only an hour, then says all my files are not supported! ! !  Refund my money please   Full Review   
  As I keep using the app whenever I add the videos it used to go by fast but now it is very slow and it doesn't let you keep the old videos it just deletes it for you so now I keep on re-installing so please fix it thanks   Full Review   
 Really  love this but... Every time  I  add a clip, the  music  stops  working  please  fix   Full Review   
 Like this app, use alot alot but... Please put in a video clip volume adjustment..... Please! This app would be perfect with it. As of right now I have use other apps just to boost the clip volume.... It's an easy update, just let me adjust clip volume and I'll keep promoting and using this app. Thanks.   Full Review   
 No change with update. Won't let me select files Just updated the app and it STILL won't let me select video files!! I paid for the Pro version and every time I try to select a video to edit, I get an error message of "Unsupported File." I've emailed the developer with no response. Took my money for a product that doesn't work. LG G4. I've sent example video already.   Full Review   
 It could be better if it has full HD. The App. is better then I thought, Its easyer to use. But it does not have a full HD1080p. I have a full HD video 1080p , after it process it the quality of video is half hd 720p. Maybe they designed it just for mobile phones only. I just upload a video to youtube, if anyone want to have a look the sample, go to ( rc plane, how i built my foam rc plane and flew with pixhawk, switch to rtl crashed) I just bought this app a few days ago.when tranfer file don't convert it.It should work ok when using mp4 files   Full Review   
 Nothing is pro about it Not any better than the regular viva video and I had to purchase it (it only allows for more than 5 min videos) .. the regular version even had an amazing update and this is old af .. the frustrating part is that I can't transfer my old studio drafts to the new one ( which is the reason why I purchased it in the first place )   Full Review   
 Not all devices can export in HD My Nexus 5X can export HD, but my Nexus 10 can only do SD. There's no way to share draft videos across devices. Very disappointing finish to an otherwise great app. Check your device before spending too much time editing a video.   Full Review   
 Don't change just enhance! Made my first video and it was so fast. Maybe it's my new phone. I enjoyed all of the features and it's simple. Keep updating this app. For YouTube users like myself it's a great aid to my montage videos for my video games.   Full Review   
 HD Export error "It closed automatically when i export the video..why, anyone knows ??? "   Full Review   
 Not exporting I created a video and i purchased pro so that i can share it with my friends. Unfortunately, when i try to share, it will say "exporting" and after completing 2% somehow, it will go back to the previous screen. It doesnt even have the courtesy to tell me what the error is.  I could create a nice video with this and now i am stuck. If you could give me a solution then i will give 5 star   Full Review   
 Love it I dont see any problems, honstly this one is better then the viva video that is free I think you should just buy the app, and if you do buy it I promise you you'll fall in love  with this app as well   Full Review   
 WHOEVER MADE THIS APP- HELP ME ASAP NOW I was using this for a recording when I went over 5 min. I bought the full app but it said that the video loading failed when I had great wifi. This is a group project for school and I definitely don't want it to be deleted. PLEASE. WHOEVER MADE THIS APP, PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE CONTACT ME TODAY OR AT LEAST TOMORROW OR ELSE I'LL GET A REFUND. NOW PLEASE!!!!!   Full Review   
 5 Star Goodness! Wow! I have to admit, this might be the most best editor I have ever came across to! I just made a short Diet Dr. Pepper commercial with it! Thanks, VivaVideo!   Full Review   
 It's good but It a great for editing, got a lot there but if there's a way to export in HD I haven't been able to figure it out. Uploaded a video to YouTube and the quality came out at 360 and not in the 1080 HD that I recorded in. I thought the paid version would let you do that.   Full Review   
 Worth it Very user friendly and easy to pickup. Tried another Video editor that that fell under the "Editor's Choice" and I must say this app far surpasses the other in my view. 5min limit w/o But you gain unlimited for purchasing. I bought it simply because I was impressed with the time I spent using this app. Nicely done 5/5 LG G3   Full Review   
 Does not work with Android. Does not run or load at all. Customer service has not responded. Don't waste your time or money.   Full Review   
 Liked editor videos by iSpartaFujitec It's really liked the "VivaVideo"... Just is replace the video editor is: Cute CUT. Because in Android can't editing video use Cute CUT, only in iOS. Android only editing video on VivaVideo.   Full Review   
 Really great I really like how I can import multiple clips with such ease. All the effects are really great. The only bad thing is the sizing. If u could make it full screen, then i would give it 5 stars   Full Review   
 Video Quality is Poop Good for simple videos like vlogs which require minimal editing, not good for voice-overs to cover up jump cuts however, (choppy transition going from clip to clip) and when adding music it fades the music at the end with no option to turn that fading off. But, the biggest issue: you guys need to improve this app by allowing HighER Definition than 1080x720! This is soon important, cause even at 1080x720, when you upload it to YouTube the quality goes down.   Full Review   
 Worst app I ever used, doesn't work and no response after 3 emails This app doesn't even work, unsupported on both paid and unpaid version, Android video worked first time, tires to contact these guys for help numerous times with no response, will Uninstall and spread the word on my forums how horrible it is, what a joke.   Full Review   
 Great video editing app for android Great video editing app. Moved to this once Google auto movie wasn't compatible with my one plus one. I don't need all the cutesy themes and speech bubbles and  wish it had better music choices or easier to add your own music. But overall, easy to use, and share. Get the pro version..worth the price.   Full Review   
 Love it overall! A one of a kind app. Not much if anything that covers as much stuff in one app. The only thing I think would be a cool addition would be the support for slow motion videos and a finer tuning slow motion editor.   Full Review
title: VivaVideo Pro: HD Video Editor

reviews:
Still the best! Stop complaing that you bought the pro version. Send them an email that you paid for it and they will send you a code to get this app ad free. Do it! Do it!   Full Review   
 Disappointed I had the paid app for years and loved it took this new version,  now it doesn't have a search engine and I'm lost.  Anybody have the Web address for their torrent search engine? ?? Not to mention I had to pay for it twice! !! And I did send email,  Google play only sends them a limited# of "coupons"!   Full Review   
 What happened? I love this app. Bought the no adds one too. Easy to use and always fix bugs in good time. I recommend it to all android users!!   Full Review   
 great torrent apps after the update there is little change in the search settings, updates the previously easy and smoothly to find any torrent file but not anymore. and the new update that is why I must to pay again? but it's okay,, because the application is very helpful, and the price is not too high .. and this tTorrent is very faster to download any file.. Thank You..   Full Review   
 Great app First I would like to say thanks for the voucher code I'm glad to have the ad free version once again, the support team dealt with my claim to get back what I had already paid for promptly. I never used the in app search to start with so it was not missed but I would like to ask if you could shorten the app name, I don't think the "(no ads)" bit on the end is really needed. No big deal if it's kept but food for thought.   Full Review   
 Terrible app. If I could give less than 1 star I would. So many other torrent apps better than this. Do not waste your time and $$$.   Full Review   
 Still awesome. Still 5 stars -- not the developer's fault Google blacklisted a supported plugin.  Is it really that horrible to do without half a cup of coffee to remove the ads again?   Full Review   
 Emailed them and got my purchase back Almost got worried. Thankfully they emailed me a purchase code. Back on pro version.   Full Review   
 Good support As a pro owner got a code for this as free version after contacting they support.   Full Review   
 Very good application People are complaining and giving one star because the search function was removed. That's unfair. Everyone who cares to read the change log knows exactly what happened. It is still the best torrent application with a lot of features.   Full Review   
 Well had to pay again Had to pay again and it still doesn't work Smh.   Full Review   
 Thanks for everything It still is easy as ever to search for your own torrents and use this program, so don't be upset they took out the search feature.. Not their fault, be mad at Google.. As it violated one of their play store rules.. Folks should read more before they complain. And thanks, got my ad free version no problem from support after I emailed them. Still rating this five stars for their continued efforts after the fact.   Full Review   
 Wish I didn't have to pay again But it's a good app.   Full Review   
  Weeks gone by and and still cant use this app. Please hurry up with a patch to fix   Full Review   
 Nothing like buying it a 2nd time I would rate higher, but since I had to buy it a second time that's as high as I can rate it.   Full Review   
 Disappointed Have been a loyal user for years. Disappointed by the disappearance of the search engine. That's one thing that set ttorrent apart from all the other clients.   Full Review   
 File is too short error still best app File is too short error still best app   Full Review   
 Still a good app Paid for pro, I think paying again won't hurt. They put a lot of effort into it, however the voucher is great. I hope the little amount paying for it again helps them keep up the good work.   Full Review   
  I never used the Transdroid search option. So I have no regrets.   Full Review   
 Best Torrent client on Android Looks like they've deprecated Ttorrent Pro.  Like the other reviewers said, shoot them and email and they'll give you a code for this version.  Thank you so much!   Full Review   
  The best torrent client!   Full Review   
 Simply the best... ...better than all the rest.   Full Review   
 Love it The best torrent solution in the market.   Full Review   
 Awesome app Recommended getting it people   Full Review   
  Easy to use   Full Review   
 Great Best one   Full Review   
  Its Ok.   Full Review   
 Not working Why cant i search?   Full Review   
 Excellent Don't rate badly because it has no search. Google forced them to remove it. It's still an excellent torrent client. Keep it up!   Full Review   
 Great app, blame Google This is a great app. But Google found that their search feature violate some of their terms. And removed their pro app from the play store. They have no choice but to relist this. I'll support nonetheless. All the best   Full Review   
 No longer the best, its a shame Got tired of Flud fragmentation I decided to go back to tTorrent after 2 months. Straightly bought the paid version cos the free one was good. But instead I found out that search is gone. Malicious? No. Illegal, maybe. Just maybe, depends on what engine and what is being searched. Just like warez on Google Search. So if no pressure from G, please reconsider, or let us install the plugin if we wish. I dont want to refund cos this app was good, and I want to support it, I'm surprised it only got 1k downloads.   Full Review   
 Excellent Unfortunate that I have to pay again but I'm happy to support an excellent product from an excellent developer. They have a good reason to charge again and the price is more than reasonable. It's a great quality app and rating it 1 star because you had to pay again is not cool.   Full Review   
 Still Great As Ever It's a pity that one of the best torrent apps is getting all these bad reviews because of some circumstances beyond the developer's control. This can be so misleading! It's still as good as ever despite having to take out the search function in order to comply with Google's policy. No problem paying for it again given that the new price is so affordable.   Full Review   
 Where's the search You guys have made a great app and I didn't mind paying it again. But you got to figure how to make search again? It is but useless without search.   Full Review   
 It's still a good app If you want the search engine with the app then don't download from the playstore. Go to the website and download the old ttorrent pro   Full Review   
  App works perfectly with all the settings I need/want (with the exception of saving to SMB/FTP network share). -1 star for having to pay again with no warning or reason.   Full Review   
 User of ttorrent pro Well, this is without search function. And why you don't make it transfered pro account to this one, so i dont buy again. Btw, very good bt app.   Full Review   
 Not working Great app until now... I Never pay for apps and this one i actually paid for and it doesnt work. Help! CAN NOT SEARCH   Full Review   
 Best torrent app without a doubt I was bummed to wake up and have this app removed from my phone. After all, being a paid user I was stumped. Not super stoked to pay again, but this app is a must and I have no problem spending .99¢. Thanks for getting it back up as fast as you did.   Full Review   
 Reason search part is gone Bad news, today I have received an email from the Play Store support: Hi Developers at tagsoft  After review, tTorrent Pro - Torrent Client, hu.tagsoft.ttorrent.pro, has been suspended and removed from Google Play as a policy strike because it violates the malicious behavior policy.  Apps that cause users to download or install applications from unknown sources outside of Google Play are prohibited. ...   Full Review
title: tTorrent - ad free

reviews:
Upgraded to pay version. I wasn't really a podcast addict when i first downloaded this app.  But now I am hardcore. I blame the creator of this app. I started out on the free version, then I had to get the paid version.  Now I'm hooked. And i don't think they have a 12 step program for podcast addicts.   Full Review   
 Addicted to Podcast Addict!!! I have been using Podcast Addict for years now. I love it. Period. The makers deserve to have a few of my bucks for the endless enjoyment I get from their app. Thanks for this great program!   Full Review   
 Problem fixed! Whenever I accidentally press the skip button the podcast I'm listening to, gets deleted. It's fixed now. Thank God it was really annoying redownloading podcasts   Full Review   
 Nothing Else Will Do After using the free app for a couple of years, I decided to venture out to check out the competition.  I even bought a competitor's app. Guess what? Came running back!   Podcast Addict is just a better total package and offers more functionality in the free version than most paid apps of competitors. Figured I'd pony up the $3 to credit the devs for turning me into an addict ha-ha!   Full Review   
 Great podcast software I've used this app nearly everyday for over a year. It does everything you'd expect and more. Very reliable.  One piece of feedback or feature I'd like to have is an easier way to add tracks to the playlist. I like to listen to my podcasts while out walking so a way of queueing them up easier would be appreciated.  Keep up the good work.   Full Review   
 Best Podcast App This is the best Podcast app on Android. Never crashes and easy to use. It's definitely worth the $2.99 to donate and get rid of those pesky ads.   Full Review   
  Long time Podcast Addict user, finally had to support the creator.   This is the best podcast app I have ever used hands down.  So many features for automation it is ridiculous.  From over 100 podcasts to finally narrowing down to my favorite podcasts under 30 :).  This podcast makes it ever so easy to search and save my favorites onto the sd card!!  GOOD JOb Xaver, keep up the good work.   Full Review   
 Satisfied It's nice to be able to download full runs of podcasts like Welcome to Nightvale or Thrilling Adventure hour for long train rides or hitchhiking adventures. Pleasent interface, nifty features, if only my version of android wasn't so (understandably) dumb.   Full Review   
  THIS IS THE APP YOU"VE BEEN LOOKING FOR ALL YOUR LIFE!!!  After horrific experiences with two other paid apps, I was delighted to find an app that can be fully tried out for free, is fully functional, seems to work, and, most importantly, HAS A RESPONSIVE DEVELOPER!  WELL DONE, XAVIER!  I am delighted to pay the $2.99 donation - your program and your support are well worth it!   Full Review   
 Awesome app, guy deserves a donation! Works great, has all my podcasts in one place and is always being updated and tweaked for the better... well it, here have $10 which is what I'll be donating right now :)   Full Review   
 Best podcast app, no doubt. Use it every day, well worth the small donation.  One request; could you make it possible to favourite a podcast from the playlist. This would save me time searching back through a long list of podcasts if I decide to remove a podcast from the playlist that I haven't listened to but wish to at a later date. Thanks.                                                 Thanks for the response but it doesn't help because I won't to favourite from the playlist.   Full Review   
  I've used a couple podcast apps. This one comprehensive podcast app does everything you need and is easy to use. There are a couple of UI choices that could be improved, but by and large this app is great. I was using the free version for a few months and it was such a good value upgrading to the paid version was an easy decision. I've been using it for a little over a year now and it's simply the best. I highly recommend using either.   Full Review   
 Good app **UPDATE**  info from developer worked. How obnoxious of the BBC.  --   A couple days ago all the BBC podcasts started failing to sync. Not sure what's going on but as those comprise about half of what I listen to it's very frustrating.  I'm able to download from BBC website just fine...   Full Review   
 No Royals Baseball! Look I don't mind donating an helping out... But for me to look up a local podcast an it can't be found... is very disappointing. . I am on the road an i can't even get a podcast for the only 2 baseball games going on in the whole usa... hmmmm. The cuds ,  Mets,  Royals,  Bluejays.   Full Review   
  Of all the podcast apps I've tried, this is my absolute favorite.  I'ts a bit complex, but if you hang with Podcast Addict you will be rewarded.   The customizations allows you to manage your playlist exactly the way you want.  Unlike other apps, the bluetooth audio handling works great.  The developer puts out frequent updates and responds quickly to bugs/problems.   Full Review   
 The Best Podcast App On Android Fantastic app & UI, nice features & an abundance of content available. Had no hesitation donating to the developer in this case & the ad removal that comes with that is always a bonus all day long imo. 👍   Full Review   
 Good podcast player Note 5 on At&t. Great app! Developer responds very quickly! small bug.  Every time I am listening and my phone connects to wifi, playback stops and I have to wake my phone up in order to resume playing. But very small issue, great otherwise!   Full Review   
  this is THE podcast app to get!  i've tried many others.  ton of functionality.  support is best ever.  prompt and helpful.  new features constantly being added based on customer feedback.  only minor quibble is that it can be difficult to navigate all the menus at first, but that's a side effect of all the functionality being supported here.  i wouldn't know how to better organize the menus myself.  now that i've used the app for a while i no longer have any problems navigating the menus.   Full Review   
  Xavier, the developer is the best! Answers emails FAST and makes sure the problem is solved. The app is hands down the best podcast catcher app, but you know that already.   Full Review   
 Great app better Dev Posted a review of the free version with a problem I was having downloading new episodes of a newly added podcast . Dev responded right away. I started an email exchange with him on a Saturday and he was all over it trying to help me fix what very well could be user error. Amazing response time, care and customer support for a non-paying user . I had no problem with the ads, but wanted to do more than just say "thank you" for him going the extra mile to make my experience the best it could be.   Full Review   
 Addicted This app is great! Keeps my podcasts up to date and organized. Faster listening speed saves me time. Keep up the good work.   Full Review   
  I used this app for an embarrassing amount of months before donating. What was I thinking?? It's intuitive, never crashes, and gives me seamless access to any podcast i could imagine. I guess it is easy to take the brilliant things for granted. Thank you Xavier. You write excellent code, my friend.   Full Review   
 Essential for podcasts Some apps are so good that you wonder how you coped with anything else. This app is one of them. It is feature-packed but not bloated, with in-built RSS support (great for podcasts that provide blog posts to accompany episodes) and practically allows you to customise how customised you want your feeds to be - do they all download only to the last 5 episodes while on Wi-Fi, or can this or that podcast download up to 10 even on cellular, and so on. I came for the SD card support, but stayed for the great app.   Full Review   
 There is no better podcast app Trust me this is the best podcast app but there are a few problems with chromecasting and it would be nice if this app was more organized and PLEASE ADD more material design transitions & MAKE EVERYTHING SMOOTHER. Otherwise this podcast app is basically perfect   Full Review   
 My favorite! I tried dozens of podcast apps and out of frustration I kept using my mp3 player instead of just my phone. I had a wire nest too! Now I have only my phone because I can listen to my podcasts my way! The mp3 player and other apps are outta here!   Full Review   
 Best podcast app I've used on android Just donated to help support, the ads Arnt bad at all, I would recommend top ant and all of my friends who are interested in podcasts.   Full Review   
  Only the second time I've paid for an app, this is faultless. Brilliant interface, easy to use and download things ahead of time, works with the controls on the phone's headphones, very smart and very sophisticated. Love it.   Full Review   
 Took some getting used to, but solid app. I was on the fence about this app for a long time. I just wasn't sure if I liked it or not; after a while though, I got used to it and it works really well. I've tried other options, and at the end of the day this really is the best podcast app available for Android.   Full Review   
 BEST PODCAST APP EVER! DON'T BAN THIS! This is dumb! Best app ever! And ur banning it over something so incrediblely DUMB? Shame on you GOOGLE!   Full Review   
  Podcast Addict is the best Podcast app I've used up to now. Since it features many awesome things that aren't even listed by the app (DashClock Widget e.g) and works perfectly fine, I can gladly donate a bit for the dev so he can continue to work on this :) Oh, and did I mention that you don't even would have to donate to use every single awesome feature? It would be easy to lock away all of them, but to give them all users for free is a very nice thing that also convinced me to buy it.   Full Review   
 I'm happy to pay for such an EXCELLENT developer and great service!! XAVIER  is an EXCEPTIONAL developer. He really listens to his users, and he's constantly making improvements based on our feedback.        PODCAST ADDICT is an excellent all-in-one podcatcher that is reliable and ready to use.                          Wide array of podcasts. Menus are thorough, and quite easy to navigate. Playlist allows sorting; marks played & partially heard. Easy backup & restore when changing devices.  Many excellent features.                                      I highly recommend it!!   Full Review   
 Beyond other apps.... This app is a great find,  it brings all the podcasts to you,  easy to find,  great options for downloading,  I really like the option to download oldest first,  for some podcasts that is key!   I had been a beyond pod user,  but they redesigned and it was really clunky,  I am glad podcast addict is so easy to use while still offering the more advanced features. Thanks   Full Review   
 Greatness I really appreciate development, the flexibility of the whole application, being able to add by link is very useful and simply missing in other apps, and the full featured application for free! I donated and I'm happy to do so. Dev is very good I'm tip my hat to you and you deserve every bit of that $2.99. Thanks for the continued focus on making this app better all the time and rock solid.   Full Review   
  I have been using a smartphone for the last 7 years and in that time I have never reviewed an app. That in itself should speak volumes. I also had absolutely no reason to pay for this app/donate -- none. The free app has ads but I only saw them once and they were unobtrusive and default to banner and not interstitial. The app works so well that once it's configured to your liking, you don't even need to open it. There are no nag screens and no limitations (that I saw anyway).  Some people are calling the interface clumsy and I couldn't disagree more. There are a lot of settings sure but as someone that likes things to work in a very specific way, I wouldn't like the app if it were any different.   The stock Android music apps would constantly lose my place. Using this app's player podcasts now pick from where I left off every single time. It's so nice to not spend 7 minutes every car trip finding my place and hitting play.  The app is perfect. Please don't change a thing. If you must,  only rearrange what's there or add to it. Do not remove anything. I also appreciate the developer only asking for the bare minimum of permissions.  To the developer, great work and thank you.   Full Review   
  I love this podcast app and listen to various podcasts with it several times a day, well worth it for this paid version. However over the last 10 days or so I've been having intermittent problems, podcasts just stop playing or what looked like one podcast playing is actually another and others getting corrupted. I do subscribe to a lot of podcasts though and there is a possibility of data corruption, either my fairly new micro sd card (not a fake one) or my phone, Moto G2 which is only a few months old.  Editing to add that it looks like the problem was with my phone (Moto G2 8gb) corruption memory cards as I've now been through two of them and need another new one. Without a memory card inserted there haven't been any more problems with garbled podcasts.  I am still having problems with playing podcasts stopping in the middle of playing and Podcast Addict quits but I also think that this is due to bad memory management on the Moto G2 as I also have it installed on my Nexus 7 v2 tablet and don't have any problems.  Sorry (to the developer) that I missed his reply asking for more details and only saw it when I came on here to update.   Full Review   
 Great interface, large selection, totally worth donating I was honestly very surprised that they had certain podcast that I listen to. Odds are if you have a podcast it's on here. Really great interface, everything is nice, clean and very easy too find. Only gripe there is that the ads really bring the look down. Only tall major gripe I have is that when I use my head phone too pause and play it occasionally starts playing my music which wasn't even on. Other than that really great and handy app for podcast listeners and definitely worth hanging this guy a little   Full Review   
 I loved the app until the update. I loved this app and even donated to it. This last update though removed all of my subscriptions. Why the loss of data, couldn't you have migrated it for the new version?   Full Review   
 So happy I bought it! If you're new to podcasts this will get you going fast. The settings allow you to adjust nearly everything this so does, but with great power comes a difficult to learn system of menus. Check the PodcastAddict FAQs to get started and you'll have the best Podcast app on the Internet customized just for you. Well worth the effort. Great job Xavier!   Full Review   
 Takes a little effort, but THE BEST Xavier has created a terrific app, pretty darn user-friendly, and X gets right back to you PERSONALLY with any queries or concerns. All kinds of awesome settings options, such as skipping intro &/or outro, which the user can designate for individual podcasts measured by the second! Throw the man some cash to get rid of ads -- TRULY AD FREE! And it's the very least you can do for a 5 star app.   Full Review   
 This app = podcast perfection! I don't usually download paid versions or donate versions of apps, but Xavier has earned it tenfold! This is the only app you'll need for listening to your podcasts.  Smooth, easy gui. Sooooooo many features for every little thing you'd want.  Volume boost.  Automatic downloads and cleanup.  It's just perfect.  You won't regret downloading this.   Full Review

  What a bummer.  I just purchased the Pro version of this software.  I got the paid version because of the good reviews and the hardware acceleration.  Then I find out it will not play any AC3 audio.  So NO Dolby 5.1, DTS,  DTSHD, EAC3 or MLP will work.  I got this program to play videos on an NVidia Shield Android TV (NSAT) device on a 4K UHD TV and 7.1 surround sound home theater AV receiver.  There are all sorts of instructions or how to make sound come out of a phone,.  But the Shield just upgraded to Android 6 (Marshmallow), and nothing seems to work on the NSAT.  So BUYER BEWARE.  I really feel that a flaw this serious, should either be addressed, or potential buyers be forewarned.  **NOTE** Even with the third party codec for AC3 sound, it still downmixes the audio to only 2 channels (stereo). **Note Two** After owning this for a few weeks, I am upgrading my review from one to two stars,  Mainly because the program's buffering algorithms are better than other video players I've tried.  If it handled 5.1 channel audio codecs, I'd be giving it 4 or 5 stars.  Just license the stuff and charge more for the program.   Full Review

  If your focus is automatic multi-360-panorama or orbit missions, then you're better off with Ultimate Flight App (and cheaper). If you like better UX and potentially future features (tracking), then you are better off with this one. 3 stars due to value for money.        In comparison to the Ultimate Flight App:     (+) Much more intuitive interface/UX with Litchi     (+) Setting-up waypoint missions across devices     (+/-) Tracking functionality could be nice in the future, but still very experimental     (-) Waypoint missions only allow horizontal panoramas, no 360, no custom panoramas (have to choose separate flight mode for that)     (-) Waypoint missions do not allow circle-orbits (have to choose separate flight mode for that)     (-) Sequence of waypoints cannot be changed once waypoint mission is setup (waypoints have to be deleted and inserted and setup again)           @Litchi developers: Following features would be great (actually more than the tracking mode, sorted by my prio): 1) Integrate 360+custom panorama waypoints in the mission mode 2) Integrate orbit mode into flight mission mode 3) Change sequence of waypoints   Full Review

I've attempted multiple times to contact support with no reply.  If I could attach screen shots,  I surely would.  ***The reply posted Below was sent only after this review was posted.  They are blaming the decoder saying the s5 isn't strong enough.   Ironically the same decoder that other vr flight apps use without issue as it is inbeded in the sdk. ***   Full Review

[BATTERY FIX] use "Purify" by Kingroot or similar app to kill unwanted background processes. [+++]Still the functionality of this app is worth paying for and absolutely a must for large panoramic photography.   Full Review

  June 7th update.   After four straight 13.5 hour days of using the WAN, and no "CRASHES", I have decided to up my rating back to five stars!  Thanks Ken for having your developer finally fix the app crashing issue.  I like the smaller thumbs, as I think that was the root issue from the get-go.  Seemed like when you had more than40 or so alerts was when the app crashed the most.   As far as the few crashed while using Wi-Fi, I can live with that!!!!  Again, thanks Ken for listening and getting the app fixed.   Full Review

Lost connection to one camera and can not get it back from the app.  Not happy but already spent the money :/   Full Review   
 Continually degrading... I bought the PC and Android app a year ago and it seems like each update to both platforms reduces the usability incrementally. Currently on an Moto x pure and after moving into a new house and updating both server and client from a 1+ month old version the PTZ is intermittent on my Foscam cameras and the android app can no longer see  live feeds or alert clips. I'm beginning to dread that rotating refresh arrow as that is all I see. Having to consider other options now.   Full Review   
 Needs much improvement For a $10 app after buying $50 software this app is nearly non functional. Cannot adjust camera settings from app, reset camera, won't give push notifications, no led for notification, etc. Have a camera that's not viewable with blue iris but is with camera branded app and cannot reset the camera via blue iris on the road. Wasted my money.   Full Review   
 Great Great   Full Review

I've been using the app around one year or so I  the beginning it was constantly crashing on me but thanks to updates it works as it supposed to that is why I'm changing my rating to 5 stars.   Full Review   
 Works great Must have app if you have blue iris software on your PC.   Full Review   
 Blue Eye Overall Works fine. Not sure what logout bug fix is?   Full Review   
 Amazing app This in conjunction of the desktop version is just amazing. I run a small server at home with a very high speed connection and multiple mp cams and this program is so fluid. I love it and I will live longer without the stress of not knowing why my alarm is going off when I'm 100 miles or more from home. The cameras tell me it all. Thanks to the dev for all your hard work you rock bro.   Full Review   
 Awesome! This is app, combined with the PC software is a great home security solution. Even now, I am still adding and growing the system and its all so easy to do with this app and software.   Full Review   
 Works great! Works great as a remote solution for Blue Iris on the PC. You can access your camera controls and play back alerts from your history.   Full Review   
  Best app for blue iris   Full Review

Since this app was written to work with the PC version, it's exactly what I needed. A little pricey, but I don't mind paying for a good solid app that does what I want it to do.   Full Review   
  I have multiple servers and have used this on tablets and phones.  Recently upgraded our phones to Motorola X Pure editions and this app no longer works.  You can log in and get your camera list but any attempt to view a live camera or previous recording causes the app to sit at the "loading" screen.      2016-02-17 - Support has been notified and we exchanged emails on the issue I am experiencing.  Will update this review once the issue is resolved.  Phones: MotoX Pure Android: 6.0 Multiple Servers:  4.2.9.3 x64  2016-02-26 - Working like a champ on MotoX Pure now.  Assume the latest server update resolved whatever issue it was.  Thanks!!!   Full Review   
 Works great and smooth. 2/28 - This is a great supplement if you run BlueIris. I'm able to view recordings and can easily select the date and time. The interface is catching on to ease of use compared to built in software for other NVR'S. Currently have it working with 4 different brand of Cameras. Have not used sound/microphone. Will update if anything changes.   Full Review   
 Reliable with a couple of quirks I have used this app for over a year. I liked it but have never been able to use the microphone on my Samsung s5. I had assumed that it was just an android thing until I saw that it works on my old original  galaxy 10.1 tab. before this. Without this feature I have jump between apps to accomplish use of the microphone. Also when reviewing clips remotely the clip will freeze if you enable sound or attempt to fast forward. Its been a good app, my needs have changed and made these 2 issues a bid deal.   Full Review   
 So far, so great! After testing a few desktop apps, including iSpy (which was a nightmare in some aspects) and a much more expensive option, I chose Blue Iris. I bought the desktop app today and then the Android app. For $70 you can't do better IMO. I record to my Google Drive and every clip is uploaded to my FTP server. I have 5 IP cameras of mixed brands and capabilities, 2 Android phones as cameras and BI has been rock solid over the last 10 days. Should this change I will update my review and rating.   Full Review   
 Awesome cctv/camera software. Having used the full version for over 4 months and with the app running in conjunction with the desktop version works very well. Very happy with it and it does exactly what it says on the tin. 5 stars from me... 😆   Full Review   
 Update broke app For the last few months the app has suffered from horrible stuttering. This began occurring immediately after a previous update. The web client and desktop application work just fine.   Full Review   
 Pause alert Would like the ability to pause motion email alerts.   Full Review

reviews:
Bloody awesome! It's greatest strength is its complexity and versatility to control and access the video feeds via multiple devices and protocols, where competing products are severely limited in order to appeal to the less tech savvy user. The ability to stream directly to VLC puts this app miles ahead of the rest. Keep up the fantastic work!   Full Review   
  This is almost perfect, very very powerful and a reminder of why I switched to Android in the first place.   The functionality on this is astounding.  I wasn't sure what to expect but this really is a pretty good CCTV / Webcam option.     There's a couple of very small issues and one or two things which could be improved but it's still one of the best examples of a very VERY functional app I've seen on Android in a long time.  Right now it's hooked up to mains power for me, recording video based on motion or audio detection, I can go to a web interface and grab the files, remotely delete them - etc.     Real good stuff, despite the tiniest of issues, I still think this is easily worth 5* and the money.   (note, I bought the paid version, despite the free one doing what I needed, this kind of code should be supported)   Full Review   
  Wow, what a find! I'm using an old, almost discarded ICS phone as a surveillance camera using Pavel's IPCamAdapter and  WebcamXP Free to continuously record video in one of the rooms in my house. It took a bit of a bit-twiddling to get it all hooked up and working but does work brilliantly. Thanks for this fab program and breathing new life into my old phone!   Full Review   
  every time I start the stream, i get a "license error forbidden" and the camera disconnects.  Same message on all my devices.  Not sure why this app doesn't work anymore.   Full Review   
  Does what it is supposed to do and does it well. The shortcut can also be integrated into Tasker w/ the help of the AutoShortcut plugin to activate from just about anything/anywhere!   Full Review   
 Streaming error using data only on Nexus 6p. Streaming only works on wifi. I use Verizon and have a pretty good signal but I get a streaming error when using data. This app is pretty much useless to me if I have to be tide into a wifi network to use!  I even lowered the streaming quality and it still doesn't help.  Please let me know if there's a fix and I'll change my rating.   Full Review   
 Fantastic Had searched for reversing cam app to use for parking caravan, this is so simple to use phone wi-fi'd via mobile wi-fi modem router to tablet that I also use for GPS navigator in car. Would give more stars if possible, so paid for Pro version.   Full Review   
 ((Great App)) Plug-ins not downloading.Is there alternative where can i download them? .Pro version is more power full with Tasker integration.   Full Review   
  It will run the pro version for two seconds then throw an error saying licencing error forbidden.   Full Review   
  nice app BUT I need to use app on background. It opens on boot on front of all apps I run. I used it for home automation. Please add the ability to start on background!   Full Review   
  I have tried soo many of these programs, and this one is superb! I love it. Only missing feature is schedule. I just want to record when I'm not home.   Full Review   
 Great App 1 question... How do I view my camera from this  phone, using phones ip address, on another phone? Works fine if view on my PC   Full Review   
 Been using this app a few years. Still love it!   Full Review   
  Totally super happy with this app   Full Review   
  Very good app!   Full Review   
 Seems to die on marshmallow After a few hours of working, it no longer broadcasts out until you poem the app and start server again.  Assuming it is related to doze.  Tried both foreground and background modes.   Full Review   
 Works great! Contracted Dev and was able to resolve all issues!   Full Review   
 Great app, but new version not working Attempting to install, claims "Insufficient storage available". My device has plenty of storage left. All other apps install without problems.   Full Review   
  It'll work for a few hours, but after a number of hours go by, it'll just stop recording on its own and quit out back to the main screen. I regret spending the money to buy this app. I'm seeing this behavior on multiple devices, including a Nexus 5.   Full Review   
 OPINION & SUGESTION (1) tested on galaxy tab 2 10", lenovo a2107 7", motorola admiral, moto droid x, stratosphere i405, samsung i200, allview a5 smiley, s3mini g730a (at&t), s3mini i8190n (uk) and works perfect (2) add this and i buy it: the option to "start recording on device boot" is very usefull for better surveillance.. another one, but less important: device reboot.. it's usefull to correct different glitches   Full Review   
 Good I love the app but it keeps crashing if I want to test the compatibility for  Ivideon internet streaming   Full Review   
  The online interface needs two additional options. Turning off the app, and restarting it. The flash option randomly stops responding, and I often get just a black screen unless I manually restart the app. Tbh a way to start the server remotely without needing tasker would be neat too.   Full Review   
  Yes it will stream video to the web via Ivideon (free account only allows 2 cameras) BUT, Iveideon requires Android 4.1 or better so minus 1 star here since the description here doesn't say that. Or you need to be a geek to do a lot of other tricks to get an older phone connected to stream. BUT, if everything is on the same WIFI connection, almost anything will work and "night vision" settings even make an otherwise poor low light camera see pretty good so if all you want is a local baby monitor it is excellent. Primary device Samsung SM-T815Y Secondary device Samsung GT-P6800 Additional devices Dell Streak Mini 5 and TMobile MyTouch Slide. I noticed some are complaining that the APP "disconnects" I don't think this is an APP issue, I think it is an internet service provider issue. My primary device is on AT&T. When I am where I have true 4G, it works great, If I don't have good service, it will drop or sometimes not connect.   Full Review   
 Great job! Shut up and take my money. If you need to know how good this is just download the free version. It's absolutely brilliant, simple, feature rich & robust I've been using it for two weeks 24/7. I don't even need the pro features, I'm just buying it as a show of gratitude.   Full Review   
  Very useful. Made my Nexus 5 an amazingly good webcam for macro and highly detailed up close capture with controls from the browser. Liked it so much I bought the Pro version.   Take your time to learn all the different things it can do. Can view the video stream on VLC and control from the browser. It will drain the battery very fast on the device so take that into consideration for remote devices that you need to have cordless. Adjust the caching down on the network stream to minimize lag to VLC in the VLC network controls.   Full Review   
 This app is amazing! I highly recommend both the pro and lite version, they are truly an amazing complete set of rugged useful features. Huge thanks to the developer, made great use out of old androids. Also great to see another member of the RepRap community.   Full Review   
 Very good Excellent although the little bug makes both Focus and Flash somehow share the same options. Ex. you 'can' set your flash mode to Macro or Infinite making it a nasty bug   Full Review   
 Awesome app! Suggestion for the developer: Multiple User Access with restriction settings for non admin users would be super useful! Great way to re-purpose old phones into something useful instead of just throwing them in the garbage. On device recording is great. Battery in my old LG Optimus last over 5 hours with minimal options set. Love this app, very polished and tons of options/ flexibility. Hint: If you need a static IP it must be set in your Android wifi settings.   Full Review   
 Needs native FTP upload Very polished but needs native FTP upload like most FTP cameras have. Having to purchase another app (tasker) to do this is not ideal.   Full Review   
 Impressive I was impressed with the free version, even though it was a little quirky. Bought this anyway to support the developer. The Pro version is a million times better. No ads, shortcut to start the server, and the sliding camera controls via the web interface actually work now! (they did not in the free version, even on the same device). The pro version even uses less bandwidth - in the free version, it would take up my entire 5MBPS upload limit no matter what quality stream I selected. In the pro version, even higher quality streams use less bandwidth! My antique Nexus 7 gen 1 tablet runs this well for extended periods!  Great job, dev! Hope you keep up with updates!   Full Review   
 Great Only one matter,,I can't record video on mp4 format. Could u help please?   Full Review   
  Good app but really needs to self delete videos when set on motion detection, please add option   Full Review   
 Works well. It's seems a bit buggy. It works well but touchy on my Galaxy s2 and I can't install the pro version. (Claims "insufficient memory")The lite version will do. Thank you. It's a fun app.   Full Review   
  The app itself is great, however there is a bug. If you leave this running after a few hours it will drop to the configuration screen. I have emailed the developer 3 times, but no response.  However if this can be fixed it will be a 5   Full Review   
  Great app, but the cleanup function doesn't work. It's supposed to delete old files....   Full Review   
 Great app I am using this to repurpose an old phone as well as turn my daily driver into an ad hoc web camera. The pro version offers tons of options within Tasker. Responsive developer. I emailed a question and got an answer right away. Works great with tinycam monitor.   Full Review   
 Works well and does what it is meant to do Worth the upgrade, in my opinion. Works like a charm and never have a problem with it.   Full Review   
  In general this has been a great app doing what it claims.  However, I have 2 nagging problems:  1)  The camera kept stopping and return back to the config menu after running for a while.  2)  I use tinycam Monitor software, and it kept failing to connect to IP web cam every now & then.  Not sure which app is causing the disconnect.  Would have been 5 stars if I can solve these 2 problems   Full Review   
 Are you able to refund if their is not enough space R u able 2 refund if there's not enough space   Full Review   
 Superb I am a CCTV engineer and this app is one of my most frequently used tools.   Full Review
title: IP Webcam Pro

reviews:
Input issues Great on paper, except that cellphones' head tracking ability is far from perfect, and I can't get the thing to read inputs from a USB device. I use my OTG cable to connect my keyboard or gamepad, both of which work outside the video player (even to navigate the menus within the app!) But I can't use those things to actually reorient the video player when the head tracking inevitably drifts. Fix this and it's 5 stars.   Full Review   
 Vr player pro. Love this app. But every time I return from settings the aspect ratio has turned into 4x3. The only way to get the proper ratio is to reenter open files and restart movie. A bit of a pain when you are trying to fine tune your screen.   Full Review   
 Great! The head tracking with my SGS6 isn't as good as the head tracking with my One Plus 2 phone (It's perfect!) It's a good idea to test a phone with this app and Cardboard if you're into VR and want a good experience.   Full Review   
  There didn't seem to be a slideshow facility for pictures in the free version so I got the paid version thinking it may be a paid only function but it doesn't seem to be able to do it either. It's pretty pointless only being able to view one picture and not scroll backwards and forwards (or have an automatic timed option) through the whole album/directory or am I missing something? I'm not begrudging paying £1.28 for it as I'll probably still use it for videos but needs more photo viewing slideshow functions (particularly the ability to advance/go backwards through photos with a Bluetooth controller).   Full Review   
 Very good foundation Already very much usable VR video player. Some more features and polish and it's there. Edit: You should wrap subtitles inside the screen. Long subtitles just go off-screen for me when watching external subtitles at least. Embedded mp4 subtitles work very well.   Full Review   
 Far from perfect. But its the best of the bunch imo Doesn't work since the latest update. Blank white screen as soon as I launch the app, on my S5. UPDATE: I'm loving the new features and UI since your most recent update, have changed my rating to 5*. Unfortunately I can't get my cardboard 2.0 to work well with my Samsung S5, but that's no fault of the app. Thanks for the reply and keep up the good work!   Full Review   
  Since last major update last year it's no more possible to fine adjust display settings (position and size of the 2 views). Therefore unusable on Nexus 6 because of double vision issue! Can you developer get a Nexus 6 and test it out?!? If I remember right we paid for this app!   Full Review   
 Neat app Works well with a vr headset I got for Christmas. Has some weird tracking issue though where the video continually pans to the right and I have to keep re-entering the video.   Full Review   
 Input Bug Having the same issues reported by other users regarding external inputs. Fix it and it's 5 stars!   Full Review   
  The videos play ok until I switch to cardboard mode. Then it starts stuttering. Any solution to that? Otherwise a great app, sadly this is a critical point for immersion! UPDATE: I'm using a Galaxy S6. I tried restarting the phone, and I can see some degradation after I load the second movie - but even the first is not as slick as the video player or homido player. I really hope you guys can fix this!   Full Review   
 Good Good app but needs more screen adjustments and the "url" feature is good, but a direct youtube search would be great as the url feature is hit and miss if it will work or not.   Full Review   
 Poor stuttery performance On my very capablleGalaxy Note 5, this app somehow still has trouble running  even a 1080p 180 degree VR video at a relatively high bit rate without immersion-breaking stuttering and low framerate. 2160p, 15000 or above bit rate runs even worse. I know it's  not my phone at fault because I've tried the same videos in another  VR video player app called "AAA VR Cinema Cardboard and that runs high res & bit rate videos perfectly. It's  too bad, because VR Player Pro has the best customization options.   Full Review   
  For a few bucks, this quality player is a good steal. There was some hiccups with some releases, but overall it is at the pinnacle of performance in the VR league. Recommended for anyone who wants the real deal. I can't wait to see what's coming next ..everything happens so fast nowadays!   Full Review   
  I thought the pro version of this app was great for my S5, a 5 star program easily. However I upgraded to the S7 Edge this weekend and now whenever I try to open files from my SD card it says "can not open file". They opened fine on the SD card when it was in my S7. Can anyone help? I'll upgrade to 5 stars when this is fixed but at the moment it's useless.   Full Review   
 Love it. Virtual Reality never felt so good. Watching my stored videos in a unique way is a dream come true not to mention the ability to watch 3d videos and YouTube videos. I highly recommend this product to VR enthusiasts.   Full Review   
 Not consumer-ready Wouldn't load the first video I tried, but also gave no error message--just silently ignored the command. I tried a stream from the author's own site, and that worked, but it never hides the control overlay or title bar, which interferes a bit with VR. Double-tap to calibrate wouldn't work with the magnet in cardboard 1.0, so I had to pull the phone out of cardboard frequently. It's mostly okay once it gets a vid going, but it's very unpolished.   Full Review   
 Stuttering badly 3D video over LAN will stutter badly(pausing for a moment for every few seconds of play), making it unusable. SpherePlay does not have this issue. Please optimize this so that it can flawlessly play video over a network drive without stuttering. I am using note 5 with ES explorer to choose which file to play over LAN. Most of the vr files are on the network drive since they mobile has limited space.   Full Review   
 Used to be better. Why do my settings reset to default every time I load a video? Very annoying. Video is also choppy. Taking refund. (Droid turbo)   Full Review   
  Works well enough, loved it especially for its customization options (projections, FOV etc). This is also one of the few cardboard VR apps that can be used on the Samsung Galaxy Note 2 without drifting (well it still drifts, but it will "compensate" eventually unlike almost all other apps, where drift is ever constant).   However, there is a small trouble for controlling with bluetooth peripherals (keyboard, joypad etc). It would seem that most of the time, the app will ignore inputs from such devices (they worked in other apps and at the homescreen). And once in a while, it will suddenly start working as it's supposed to. I have no idea and can't find out how to reliably make the app recognize bluetooth device inputs (they worked great when it works, but most of the time it doesn't). So I will definitely give it 5 stars when this small issue is fixed.   Full Review   
 Recent update broke some things. I loved this app, it worked brilliantly. It's unfortunate that after a recent update that some key functionalities have broken. Currently running on a Xperia Z5 premium. Was utilizing a ps4 controller via Bluetooth for controlling which no longer functions regardless of how I map the buttons. Also, was using the head shaking motion to recenter and recalibrate the screen, but now it works spotty at best, requiring a large amount of force to register. Please consider working on these issues in the near future   Full Review   
 Needs improvement but gets the job done The app menu does not rotate in both directions. My problem with the HTC One m8 is I can only have my headphone jack to the left. So the apps menu is upside down when in use.   Full Review   
 Latest version rubbish Option to put padding between viewports has gone. This is fairly annoying. Can't open files from SD card on either file browser (crashes in simple mode when trying to go to root folder to move to SD card, the other just won't open the files). Can only open files in external app but most settings change to defaults each time. Flickering problem seems to be fixed but tracking drifts now. A formerly brilliant app; it's really disappointing now. Crashes on Marshmallow a lot during play. Devs unresponsive.   Full Review   
 Option to remember projection type!! Excellent app, almost - but how is the user supposed to tolerate viewing many media of same projection type (in my case spherical images) when the projection setting reverts to "Plane" each time a new file is loaded? An obvious fix, please just add a "remember setting" toggle beneath the projection options so the user only needs to specify this once, if need be. Then I can stop pulling my hair out :)   Full Review   
 Awesome player. Must have This is a MUST have for gear vr users. Need to have cardboard for gear installed first. Smacks down the standard vr gallery for a six. Watch 3d sbs in correct aspect so 3d ratio or adjust it so it's not squashed. If you double tap main control button it re aligns screen where ever you look, so I can full lay down and watch a movie AWESOME. Two things I would like to see. Option for gear vr in head display. VR users will take still photos, both 360 and 180 degree varieties. This player should support them.   An even bigger problem is one pointed out by other reviewers, it does not remember your settings. Here is an example. I have a collection of 180 strereo still photographs (side-by-side). To view them I have to search for and select one (it won't play all the files in a directory). Then switch to stereo (3D), then switch to "Dome" projection. That's about five steps and requires that I take the phone out of the viewer. To see the next photo I have to repeat THE WHOLE PROCESS. So this viewer is useless for viewing still images.   Seriously guys, you didn't think of this? Didn't notice it is a problem?   Full Review

  Should have waited with Android release.  There are just too many issues for this app to be considered stable and too many features missing "while we are working on them." There's also a problem with excessive contrast that can't be adjusted. Sure, you can underexpose and hope to restore detail in darker areas in post production. But for a "state-of-the-arts" app, that's unacceptable. I recognise that creating a sophisticated app that works equally well on many Android phones is a much taller order than it is for the few iPhone variants. But that's precisely why they should have waited or at least waited to charge for an unfinished product. Bad sport!!   Full Review   
  The Android version of this app still needs a lot of love. I'm using it on my Samsung S7 and there are several features that either don't work or are broken in some fashion or another. A few cases in point, I cannot control the mic audio gain at all. The slider moves up and down properly, but doesn't affect the audio feed whatsoever. Another is the focus lock. I can move the slider which will temporarily move the camera focus to that point, but then the camera immediately attempts to auto focus on something else within the frame. Even without the use of the slider, setting the app to lock the focus does nothing. The camera focus on whatever it feels is the main subject. Exposure is also somewhat broken. While I can manually set exposure and it does stay locked, moving the exposure reticle to different parts of the view does absolutely nothing. It's always using a weighted balance over the entire image. So, i have to full frame a section that has the correct exposure, then lock that level, and finally pull back to the scene I want to capture. There are more problems, but I'm out of words for one review.  If they can mirror the iPhone app (which I also have) 5 stars. For now only 3.   Full Review

 Poorly thought out but great start Although this is a very powerful video recording app, it is implemented in a way that is illogical for Android users.  One example is the "remove" button in the clips browser. Why couldn't you just use the word "delete"? The developers should remember that these are not Apple users using FilMic on Android, these are Android users who may never have seen your Apple app! Another example is scrolling through the menus. It is completely illogical for an Android user. With all that said it is a very powerful video recording app. My favorite feature is the ability to set the file names by project, and have them incrementaly updated as I create new takes. So from an engineering perspective it's a magnificent app, but please hang the Apple GUI designer from a tree, and get someone more used to developing GUI on Android!   Full Review   
  The android version of this App does NOT have the same framerates and resolutions as the iOs version.  The app is fine, but the big selling point was customization.  I wanted to use this app for specific framerates and slow/fast motion effects that I cannot choose because they aren't on the limited preset list.  Including anything above 30fps at any resolution.  There are also no resolutions between 2k and 4k which I would have liked to used for stabilization and/or downscaling in post.  (also annoying that all the cool aspect ratios like cinemascope are crops from 1080p only, a minor quibble since there are guides).  There's nothing "wrong" with this app so much as it is clearly using its success on ios to sell itself while not making it clear (Except in fine print) the android version does not have the same capabilities leading to disappointment.   I had problems at first using this with my quanum v2 goggles. I bought the right easycap device off ebay, and had to buy a male to male rca cable as well. I kept getting "signal lost" every time I plugged my phone in. This is for two reasons. First, turn off the signal detection. Second, I had to change the settings: Startup device to UTV007 (iSTK1160 was the default), and video format to NTSC (PAL was default).   Other thoughts: Since it's the only app I've found that actually recognizes that a camera is plugged in, I suppose the price is worth it. There is some latency. It's to be expected though. Not too bad, you can probably use this as your main monitor if you wanted to be super cheap.  It would be nice if this could record, but there are screen recording apps that can be downloaded.   I hope this helps if you're having trouble setting it up.   Full Review

Last, if it's not completely frozen, it'll freeze on one frame and the audio will continue... Which is more frustrating than completely freezing because it never catches up and you have to miss a lot because you have to close and reconnect.   Full Review

 Remarkably awful Freezes up on 40mbit internet?   Occasionally errors?   No chromecast support.   Garbage, just garbage.   Full Review
